inputs.body: I processed a receipt for @{outputs('Extract_Receipt_Info')?['body/responsev2/predictionOutput/result/fields/merchantName/value']} for $@{outputs('Extract_Receipt_Info')?['body/responsev2/predictionOutput/result/fields/total/value']}. I assigned it to GL Code

definition.description: This flow starts when a user submits a receipt file. It extracts key details from the receipt, then retrieves a list of general ledger codes from an Excel file. Using AI, it matches the receipt’s merchant to the most appropriate code. The flow then creates a new expense record with the extracted information and the selected code. Finally, it sends a confirmation message summarizing the processed receipt, including the merchant, amount, and assigned code. The process is fully automated and ensures accurate expense categorization.

definitionSummary.description: This flow starts when a user submits a receipt file. It extracts key details from the receipt, then retrieves a list of general ledger codes from an Excel file. Using AI, it matches the receipt’s merchant to the most appropriate code. The flow then creates a new expense record with the extracted information and the selected code. Finally, it sends a confirmation message summarizing the processed receipt, including the merchant, amount, and assigned code. The process is fully automated and ensures accurate expense categorization.
